parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, dreamy, retro-futuristic, arpeggiated bass, shimmering pads, punchy drums
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon streets hum a lullaby, flickering lights like fireflies, we drove all night just to feel alive, chasing echoes of a simpler time [chorus] Rewind the tape, let’s play it again, static and gold in the glow of the screen, hearts out of sync but we’re dancing the same, lost in the glow of a pixelated flame [verse] Your voice on the line like a distant AM wave, cracking through time like a ghost in the haze, I still see your face in the arcade’s parade, where our high scores never fade [chorus] Rewind the tape, let’s play it again, static and gold in the glow of the screen, hearts out of sync but we’re dancing the same, lost in the glow of a pixelated flame [bridge] The city’s a circuit, we’re just passing through, but the neon won’t forget you [outro] Press eject, the screen turns blue, but the afterimage lingers like you
